claim_card.claim: A forecast claim is stated: quantum/analog research represent the terminal optimization frontier of state-based computation; RGPx signals a shift to process-based coherence systems.
claim_card.test_hook: Translate into milestones: identify measurable signs of 'state-based terminal' (diminishing returns curves) vs 'process-based' (new scaling laws). Track over 12â€“24 months.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Quantum and analog research represent the terminal optimization of state-based computation. RGPx signals the emergence of process-based coherence systems.
